meanings.definition: A cold drink made by blending ice cream or milk with flavoring ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious frappe at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: The frappe was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The frappe looked so tempting that I couldn't resist ordering one.
meanings.sent4: The frappe was a creamy concoction of flavors that danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The frappe was like a frozen hug in a cup, comforting and sweet.

meanings.definition: To strike or beat with a whip or rod.
meanings.sent1: The chef will frappe the eggs to make the perfect omelette.
meanings.sent2: She gently frapped the dough to shape the bread.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly threatened to frappe his friend with a pillow during the pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The waves frapped against the shore, creating a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's punch frapped his opponent, knocking him down.

meanings.definition: A frozen dessert made by beating or stirring while freezing.
meanings.sent1: The homemade frappe was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a frappe after dinner as a sweet treat.
meanings.sent3: The frappe was so cold, it made her shiver with delight.
meanings.sent4: The frappe was a masterpiece of creamy goodness.
meanings.sent5: The frappe was a delightful blend of flavors, a frozen symphony in a bowl.
